--- File name : controller_collector_system.lua.txt
--- DataTime : 2022/09/06
--- Description : 
---

---@class controller_collector_system
local controller_collector_system = class("controller_collector_system")

--region base api

---构造方法
---@protected
function controller_collector_system:ctor()
    ---@type table<string, any>
    self.controllers = {}
end


---销毁
---@public
function controller_collector_system:dispose()
    for k, v in pairs(self.controllers) do
        self.controllers[k] = nil
    end

    self.controllers = nil
end


--endregion

--region logic

---添加controller
---@public
---@param key string
---@param controller any
function controller_collector_system:add_controller(key, controller)
    if nil == self.controllers[key] then
        self.controllers[key] = controller
    end
end

---删除controller
---@public
---@param key string
function controller_collector_system:del_controller(key)
    if nil ~= self.controllers[key] then
        self.controllers[key] = nil
    end
end

---获得Controller
---@public
---@return any
function controller_collector_system:get_controller(key)
    if nil ~= self.controllers[key] then
        return self.controllers[key]
    end
    return nil
end

--endregion


return controller_collector_system
